author: Photography Daniel Jackson
title: Western Style With a Polished Take: The Best Looks of the Season - WSJ.com
text: Western Style With a Polished Take: The Best Looks of the Season Capture the renegade spirit of the frontier, featuring lace, feathers and fancifully tooled leather—topped off with a statement hat. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio Scroll TRUE GRIT Intricately detailed pieces, such as an embellished coat, add panache. Céline coat, price upon request, 212-535-3703, and shirt, $620, hirshleifers​.com and stylist’s own bolo tie. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio URBAN COWBOY Bold breeches are made for a night on the town. Giorgio Armani pants, $1,395, armani​.com, Versace belt, $1,225, versace​.com, Stetson hat, $225, jjhatcenter​.com, Redemption boots, $1,387, redemption​.com and model’s own bra. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio Chanel shirt with scarf, price upon request, select Chanel boutiques nationwide, Balmain pants, $3,847, balmain​.com, and Versace belt, $1,225, versace​.com. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio Dior jumpsuit, $3,200, and skirt, $5,900, Dior boutiques nationwide, Stetson hat, $250, jjhatcenter​.com, Lucchese Bootmaker boots, $795, lucchese​.com. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio HIGH NOON Play tough with strong accessories. Prada jacket, $1,970, select Prada boutiques, Mugler bodysuit, $680, net-a-porter​.com, Stetson hat, $250, jjhatcenter​.com, and Lucchese Bootmaker boots, $795, lucchese​.com. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio WILD ONE Pair a feminine top with studded leather. Louis Vuitton jacket and shirt (with buckle), prices upon request, select Louis Vuitton stores, and Eric Javits hat, $750, ericjavits​.com. SHOUT OUT Luxe materials hit a higher note of drama. Calvin Klein 205W39NYC shirt, $1,500, and skirt, $890, Calvin Klein, 654 Madison Avenue, New York, and Stetson hat, $250, jjhatcenter​.com. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello jacket, price upon request, and shorts, $2,290, Saint Laurent, 3 East 57th Street, New York, Stetson hat, $250, jjhatcenter​.com, and Redemption boots, $1,387, redemption​.com. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio Dolce & Gabbana top, $975, select Dolce & Gabbana stores, Mugler corset belt, $1,430, and pants, $830, net-a-porter​.com, and Stetson hat, $250, jjhatcenter​.com. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio COUNTRY STRONG Tighten up any look with a big belt. Ralph Lauren Collection jacket, price upon request, select Ralph Lauren stores, shirt, $690, pants, $890, and belt, $595, ralphlauren​.com, Eric Javits hat, $750, ericjavits​.com, Lucchese Bootmaker boots, $795, lucchese​.com. Photography by Daniel Jackson, Styling by Geraldine Saglio Acne Studios jacket, $2,700, acnestudios​.com, Versace hat, price upon request, versace.com, Lucchese Bootmaker boots, $795, lucchese​.com.
